page.title: 04LANDSCAPE.ARCHITECTURE.
page.content: Most of our houses are very old and built of stone from Bilsdale, the stone is sandstone. Lots of the houses are modernised but some have very old things in them. Some of our houses have had the same families living in them for more than 100 years. Bilsdale is a green hilly place to look at and there are a lot of wild animals and birds.When it is spring there are wild daffodils and snowdrops.Lots of people have gardens which are well kept. The tracks on our moor are ancient some go back to the Romans and some were pack horse tracks. Our houses are joined by ancient tracks and we still use the old tracks. We can see the Television Mast, which is 1,000 feet high. It has navigation lights every 100 feet.
